metadata.feature_description: Control post visibility with different privacy levels

steps.action: Navigate to Activity Feed page
steps.expected: Activity Stream page loads with post creation area visible
steps.actual: Activity Stream page loaded successfully with post creation area visible

steps.action: Click on post creation area to expand it
steps.expected: Post creation area expands with text input and privacy options
steps.actual: Post creation area expanded showing text input field and privacy dropdown

steps.action: Open privacy dropdown and verify Everyone is available
steps.expected: Privacy dropdown shows Everyone option
steps.actual: Privacy dropdown opened showing Everyone radio button option (selected by default)

steps.action: Enter test post text with Everyone privacy selected
steps.expected: Text is entered in the post field
steps.actual: Test text 'Testing Everyone privacy - this post should be visible to all users' entered successfully

steps.action: Click Share button to create the post
steps.expected: Post is created and appears in the activity stream
steps.actual: Post was created successfully and appears in the activity stream with Everyone privacy

steps.action: Open privacy dropdown and select Community Members
steps.expected: Community Members option is selectable in privacy dropdown
steps.actual: Community Members radio button selected successfully in privacy dropdown

steps.action: Enter test post and click Share
steps.expected: Post is created with Community Members privacy
steps.actual: Post was created successfully with Community Members privacy level

steps.action: Navigate to user profile page where Friends privacy is available
steps.expected: Profile page loads with Friends privacy option available
steps.actual: Profile page loaded with privacy dropdown showing Friends option

steps.action: Select Friends privacy and create a post
steps.expected: Post is created with Friends privacy level
steps.actual: Post was created successfully with Friends privacy - visible only to friends

steps.action: Select Private (Only Me) privacy option from dropdown
steps.expected: Private option is selectable on profile page
steps.actual: Private radio button selected successfully - post will only be visible to the author

steps.action: Enter test post and click Share
steps.expected: Post is created with Private visibility
steps.actual: Post was created successfully with Private (Only Me) privacy level

steps.action: Navigate to a Group page
steps.expected: Group page loads with activity stream for group posts
steps.actual: Group page loaded successfully showing group activity stream

steps.action: Open privacy dropdown in group context
steps.expected: Group Members option is available and selected by default
steps.actual: Privacy dropdown shows Group Members option selected by default in group context

steps.action: Create a post with Group Members privacy
steps.expected: Post is created visible only to group members
steps.actual: Post was created successfully with Group Members privacy restriction

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify post visibility for different user types

steps.action: View all posts as the post owner (logged in)
steps.expected: All posts with all privacy levels should be visible to the owner
steps.actual: All posts visible to owner - Everyone, Community, Friends, Private, and Group Members posts all displayed

steps.action: Log out and view activity stream as anonymous user
steps.expected: Only posts with 'Everyone' privacy should be visible
steps.actual: Anonymous user can only see posts with Everyone privacy - Community, Friends, Private, and Group Members posts are hidden

steps.action: Verify Group Members posts are hidden from anonymous users
steps.expected: Group posts should not be visible to non-members
steps.actual: Group Members privacy posts are not visible to anonymous users - privacy enforced correctly

steps.action: Verify Community visibility for anonymous users
steps.expected: Community Members posts should not be visible to anonymous users
steps.actual: Community Members posts are correctly hidden from anonymous users

steps.action: Locate an existing post and look for edit/privacy change option
steps.expected: Post should have an option to edit or change privacy settings
steps.actual: No edit privacy option found in post menu. The post dropdown menu does not contain a privacy edit option.

issues: Privacy cannot be changed after a post is created - no UI option available for editing post privacy

steps.action: Add a comment to a post with restricted privacy
steps.expected: Comments should inherit the privacy level of the parent post
steps.actual: Comments inherit parent post privacy - comments on Community-only posts are only visible to community members

observations: Privacy dropdown uses radio button selection with values: E (Everyone), C (Community Members), F (Friends), U (Private/Only Me), R (Group Members)
Friends and Private privacy options are only available on profile pages, not on general activity feed
Group Members privacy is only available within group contexts and is selected by default for group posts
Privacy cannot be edited after a post is created - this may be by design for security/consistency
Comments automatically inherit the privacy level of their parent post
Code indicates privacy validation is enforced server-side through security codes (E, C, F, U, R) in ActivityStreamServicesController.cs
